title: Ok so creepblock's not gonna get fixed?
body:
Just look at the beginning of this Dom's video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZcCfxmWFrng?nodirect

That's just plain retarded, how the hell is this interactive or fun mechanic? It's just RNG factor of the game when it decides to fuck you up. 

And while we're at this, can Riot ever fix the minion aggro? I'm missing so many creeps just because mine decide to randomly switch and burst down the enemy one. These two things are the most tilting stuff in League.

Edit: How the fuck can someone not mentally challenged downvote this? Lol, you people.

replies.body: They are minions not creeps respect the guild. Acknoledge their presence in advanace and dont walk into people expecting to pass through them unless you want to be a ghost {{summoner:6}}  {{item:3046}}
Its some sort of Ghosting of things.  Iv had minions get blocked on where I WAS.  They get stuck and walked in circle in slowmo for about 2s
some champs have a fix for it. some champs have a passive weakness to minions.
Last time they tried, they actually had to revert due to it making things horrifically worse.
